product_name: DIBS BeautyGlowTour Duo Shimmering Blush + Contour Stick
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's GlowTour Duo Shimmering Blush + Contour Stick features a shimmering blush-highlighter and creamy cool tone contour for a full-face glow-up in the flick of a wrist.
details: DetailsFeaturesContouring + a pigmented, pearly glow, all in one duoBuilds effortlessly, blends seamlesslyDesigned for versatility, layering and endless playFor usage on the face + lipsSafe for sensitive skinAllergy- and dermatologist-testedKey IngredientsShea Butter: Rich in antioxidants, it keeps skin soft and supple by retaining moistureRice Bran Wax: Non-comedogenic wax that provides a creamy texture and locks in moistureHyaluronic Acid: Known to reduce wrinkles and fine lines by boosting elasticity and moistureVanillin: Signature scent (and a natural pheromone too)Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenItem 2628527How To UseSwipe the contour shade along the areas you wish to add definition. Add the blush-highlighter shade to areas you wish to add color and shimmer. Go straight from the stick and then blend with the Duo Brush Face, or use your fingertips to apply and blend. These Duos were designed to amp up your skin on their own or add sparkle to your favorite original Duo shades.IngredientsBlush: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Synthetic Beeswax, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Synthetic Fluorophlogopite, Vanillin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Water\Aqua\Eau, Sorbitan Oleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tin Oxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin [+/- Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850).Contour: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Mica, Synthetic Wax, Synthetic Beeswax, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Silica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Vanillin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Water\Aqua\Eau, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin [+/- Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491),Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Swipe the contour shade along the areas you wish to add definition. Add the blush-highlighter shade to areas you wish to add color and shimmer. Go straight from the stick and then blend with the Duo Brush Face, or use your fingertips to apply and blend. These Duos were designed to amp up your skin on their own or add sparkle to your favorite original Duo shades.

reviews.headline: Should Be Cheaper
reviews.comments: This product is not worth the high price. It's a great concept but not executed well. It's a little heavy, and when I first opened the contour cap part it totally fell out before I could even try it, and it is disappointingly less than an inch long so wouldn't last long if it was intact. So that was a bummer. Also the blush does blend well but isn't very pigmented, so you can barely see it. Bummed about this purchase. Definitely would try a different brand than this one.

reviews.headline: Fave!
reviews.comments: This product is so easy to use and takes care of contour, blush, and glow all in one!  Such a good value!

reviews.headline: This lasts!
reviews.comments: Blends and stays put in the humid summer heat. Very impressed with this product.

reviews.headline: I love it butâ€¦
reviews.comments: The glitter in this brought out my texture more than other highlighters I own, but the pigment and shade are gorgeous. Due to it adding texture, I don't think I'll be keeping this. As for the product itself it deserves 5 stars as it is a great formula and pigmented, plus it doesn't contain a lot of ingredients!

reviews.headline: Beautiful for fair skin girlies as well!!
reviews.comments: Super blendable and natural looking, the bronzing end has been my go to cream bronzer recently. Not too orange and not too gray!

reviews.headline: Love this stick
reviews.comments: I was looking for something like this the girl at Ulta super helpful listened to me and this is truly a nice contour with blush creamy and stays on. I highly recommend

reviews.headline: Love it!!!!!!
reviews.comments: BEST product I have used, just the right color!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a dual end bronzer and blush and this one is it! Love it.

reviews.headline: amazing!
reviews.comments: I received this as a gift for Christmas and have used it every makeup look since. it blends like a dream and does not look muddy or cakey at all. It is extremely the buildable wears beautifully throughout the day

reviews.headline: amazing!
reviews.comments: I received this as a gift for Christmas and have used it every makeup look since. it blends like a dream and does not look muddy or cakey at all. It is extremely the buildable wears beautifully throughout the day

reviews.headline: Just buy it!
reviews.comments: I had no idea how pretty this is!! Just purchased Starlit. New to contour, and the blush and bronzer blend so easily with brush!

reviews.headline: low quality
reviews.comments:
The package was damage and the blush had an strange color degradation on the side.
On top of everything, the blush doesn't last

reviews.headline: I wish you could buy them separately
reviews.comments: I understand the appeal of the double ended but honestly now that i am completely out of the contour stick and have an almost full blush stick I wish we could buy them separately. I wish we could mix and match or buy separately for refills.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I am really happy I stumbled across this. I am new to cream blush and contour. Having just one product to do both jobs makes things much easier. It's nice having colors that blend together so well already and not being left to pick them out myself. This one is a keeper.

reviews.headline: Bad Breakout
reviews.comments:
- Bad for sensitive skin!! Made me break out significantly and consistently in each area I placed this product
- color is great, just not great for skin

reviews.headline: A staple product!
reviews.comments: I normally use the DIPS Duo stick in shade 1 but I wanted to try this one and I love it! I would highly recommend this if you are newer to makeup or do not have time to do a ton of makeup. I use it everyday and it is the easiest product to use. You just apply it to the skin and blend in. The color is shimmery so if you don't want shiny finish I would stick to the regular shades. The blush is a little peachy (which I love) and the contour is a nice chocolate color. It is easy to blend and build if you want a subtle or bold look. This is a staple for me and I am so glad they sell them in stores now!!

reviews.headline: Healthy, Natural Glow
reviews.comments: This is seriously so gorgeous. The blush leaves a beautiful, healthy glow without glitter or shimmer. The contour is easy to apply and blends very easily. It is more warm toned than I prefer for contour, so it really seems more like a bronzer. I love the convenience of having a 2 in 1 product.

reviews.headline: Disappears into skin and not in a  good way
reviews.comments: I got this in the shade Retrograde Rose and it is gorgeous when i swatched it. However, when I applied it to my face it just disappeared. I literally couldn't see it show up on my face at all. I tried to build it up and was unsuccessful. Both sides just disappeared and didn't show anything on my skin. Disappointing and will not purchase it in the future and do not recommend at all. Save your money and buy the elf liquid blush and contour tubes instead.

reviews.headline: OBSESSED
reviews.comments: I have been searching for the perfect contour and blush combo and girl this is IT

reviews.headline: A New Favorite
reviews.comments: I was influenced by all the talk on social media about this brand and product. While I was eager to try it, I didn't think I'd live it as much as I do. The contour and blush, while very pigmented, blend like a dream. The convenience of having both in one stick is a big plus! Look forward to trying more Dibs products, and hope Ulta will continue to carry the line.

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely LOVE Jenna's shade of the glow tour!! I wear it everyday even though I have to wear a mask at work a bit of the time. The blush is the perfect pink-and I absolutely love the highlighter built into it. I am such a status stick girlie but i love that I can skip a step with highlighter and just do blush and glow all night. The contour shade perfectly compliments my skin tone and always blends seamlessly without any harsh lines-so important for a contour novice like me. I wore it to my birthday dinner last night and got SO many compliments on my skin and how glowy I was ! 10/10 product and shade-my duos usually last me so long-another thing I love about this stick-but I'll be so sad when it runs out!
faceoff_positive.headline: Glowing on Weekdays!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I love this product and how it looks on my face (as is the case for all the Dibs products I have tried). I especially love the glittery blush, and Courtney & Jenna definitely did a great job of designing this. However (as is also the case for most Dibs products I've tried), the plastic casing is very cheap and falls apart VERY easily. Upon my first time using this product, the blush simply fell out of the plastic and I had to place it back in. This has also happened for the lip liners I have ordered from Dibs before, and my status sticks have also had issues with the plastic simply crumbling and breaking with seemingly no cause. Although I love the product itself, this shouldn't be happening at this price point. I will continue to buy from Dibs, but hopefully they can fix these issues with their packaging, as it has happened too many times to be a coincidence.
faceoff_negative.headline: Pretty product, cheap casing!

rollup.name: GlowTour Duo Shimmering Blush + Contour Stick
